Module frogger
Package frogger.service

Enum ActAnimation

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Enum<ActAnimation>
      • frogger.service.ActAnimation
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<ActAnimation>
    public enum ActAnimation
extends java.lang.Enum<ActAnimation>

    ActAnimation

    The ActAnimation class is used to create a timer which serves to call each MovableActor to execute act method

    Note: this class is implemented as an Enum thus to be a singleton class.

    Use: 

                    ActAnimation.INSTANCE.init(background);
                ActAnimation.INSTANCE.actStart();
                ActAnimation.INSTANCE.actStop();
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Wenzheng Shan
    See Also:
    Pane, AnimationTimer, MovableActor

    • Enum Constant Summary

      Enum Constants 
      Enum Constant Description
      INSTANCE
      The shared instance for global use for whole project

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private javafx.animation.AnimationTimer actTimer
      A timer that called handle function in each frame while it is active
      private javafx.scene.layout.Pane background
      The background of scene which contains all the MovableActor

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description

      Call AnimationTimer.start() method to start the timer

      Call AnimationTimer.stop() method to stop the timer

      • init

        public void init​(javafx.scene.layout.Pane background)

        A initialize function that initialize background and call createActTimer() function to create act timer

        Parameters:
        background - A pane that contains all the MovableActor which need to be called to perfrom act method in each frame while it is active

      • createActTimer

        public void createActTimer()

        A method to initialize act timer and override the method handle(long) which will be called in every frame to execute MovableActor.act(long)

        In every frame, handle function will get all MovableActor objects from background and make judgment if this object isInstance then execute it act function

      • actStart

        public void actStart()

        Call AnimationTimer.start() method to start the timer

      • actStop

        public void actStop()

        Call AnimationTimer.stop() method to stop the timer
